title: Digitolife
author: Digitolife
created_time: September 16, 2022, 01:59:32 PMLast edit: September 18, 2022, 06:32:55 AM by Digitolife
content: About SafariSafari is a decentralized cryptocurrency purposely designed to serve the basic income aspect of human life, with an attempt to stabilize and decentralize economy at individual level.Safari coin is the native coin on Safari ecosystem under Perishable Proof of Transaction (PPoT). Unlike PoW and PoS, in PPoT miners compete based on transaction history. More the transaction volume gives a high chance to verify the next block.The Core of Safariâ€¢All people are equalâ€¢Low entry barrierâ€¢Free, fair, secureWhy Safari coin?Safari (XFS) is the world's first Blockchain powered universal basic income coin with an attempt to uplift individual's standard of living, freely and without inflation.Airdrop Phase 1Hi, kindly receive 269 free "Safari" community crypto coins.1. We use taucoin.io wallet, which is a safe and secure server-less app.2. Paste this FULL message below to TAU app airdrop function so you receive your 269 Safari coins. ðŸ‘‡tau://GHJUycSif3LniMgRhprv54f259iQJBVHS3UbawmcQ5uF/airdrop/a7b7778530303030Safari&27722193Safari Coin Details.Name: SafariTicker: XSFSupply: 1,000,000Airdrop: 968,400 (96.84%)Reserve: 11,600 (1.16%)lAds/News Pay: 20,000 (2%)Chain hash code: A777Note: Disregard any Safari coin named community with unique hash other than A777.The 968,400 airdrop budget is divided into 4 phases, each with a pool of 242,100 Safari Coins. Each pool allocation will ve shared among 900 users based on first come first served. Each airdrop phase will last for 3 months, but this phase 1 airdrop is set to close on december 2022 regardless its completed earlier before the date, if still active, we will add more time till its all emptied.
